    • Method Detail

      • setInitialProperties

        public static void setInitialProperties(int iMana,
                                        int iManaCap,
                                        int iManaGainRate,
                                        float iManaGainMultiplier,
                                        float iManaCapMultiplier,
                                        float iManaPoolCost,
                                        float iManaPoolCostIncrease)
        Set initial values for all future players.
        Parameters:
        iMana - the initial amount of mana.
        iManaCap - the initial maximum amount of mana.
        iManaGainRate - the rate at which a player naturally gains mana.
        iManaGainMultiplier - the increase multiplier in mana gain due to the use of the mana pool spell.
        iManaCapMultiplier - the increase in the mana cap due to the use of the mana pool spell.
        iManaPoolCost - the intial cost of using the mana pool spell.
        iManaPoolCostIncrease - the increase in the cost of using the mana pool spell after every use.

      • updateMana

        public void updateMana(float adjustment)
        Adjusts the players mana including the calculation of many multipliers. Kills the player if the mana is reduced below 0. Prevents the mana from exceeding the mana cap.
        Parameters:
        adjustment - the amount (positive or negative) that the players mana will be adjusted by before the application of any multipliers.

      • purchaseUpgrade

        public boolean purchaseUpgrade(float cost)
        If the player can purchase the ugrade, adjust the players mana and return true.
        Parameters:
        cost - the cost of the proposed upgrade.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether or not the player has successfully purchased the upgrade.
